Get Content

Source: R/getContent.R
getContent.Rd

Get naver news content from links.

getContent(
  turl,
  col = c("url", "datetime", "edittime", "press", "title", "body"),
  try_cnt = 3
)

Arguments

turl

is naver news link.
col

is what you want to get from news. Defualt is all.
try_cnt

is how many you want to try again if error. Default is 3.

Value

a [tibble][tibble::tibble-package]

Examples

# \donttest{
  print(news_url_ex)
#> [1] "https://news.naver.com/main/read.nhn?mode=LSD&mid=shm&sid1=101&oid=374&aid=0000184049"
  getContent(news_url_ex)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 6
#>   url         datetime            edittime            press  title    body      
#>   <chr>       <dttm>              <dttm>              <chr>  <chr>    <chr>     
#> 1 https://ne… 2019-05-14 21:04:00 2019-05-14 21:52:00 SBS C… 업계는 고사 … "동영상 뉴스 \…
  # }
